actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Favorable.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to permit the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette River and to designate a portion of the Au Sable River, Michigan, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to: (1) permit the installation and operation of facilities or other activities for the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette Wild and Scenic River in Michigan; and (2) designate a specified portion of the Au Sable River, Michigan, as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to permit the control of the lamprey eel in the Pere Marquette River and to designate a portion of the Au Sable River, Michigan, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
